description: As a user I should be able to regiter to Shop N Zip application from wherever it is possible accross all the pages
name: Registration to Shop N Zip application

elements.name: Verify the Sign Up button is displayed in header

steps.name: I am in home page of shopNzip
I should see 'Sign Up' button in header

elements.name: Verify the Sign Up button is displayed in About us page

steps.name: I am in About us page
I should see 'Sign Up' button

elements.name: Verify the Sign Up button is not displayed in About us page (when user logged in)

steps.name: I am in About us page
I logged in
I should not see the sign up button in the current page

elements.name: Verify the Sign Up button is displayed in FAQ page

steps.name: I am in FAQ page
I should see 'Sign Up' button

elements.name: Verify the Sign Up button is not displayed in FAQ page (when user logged in)

I logged in
I should not see the sign up button in the current page

I should see 'Sign Up' button in header
I click on 'Sign Up' button
I should see 'Or Creat a new TFC account!' heading at Sign Up form

elements.name: Verify functionality of Sign Up using social network icons.

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
I clicked on <social network icon > icon in signup page.
I should see a pop for <social network icon > login is appeared
I loged in with my <signin with social network> credintials
I should see Name field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Country of current resident field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Email Address field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Phone Number field in the sign up from is auto filled

elements.name: Verify functionality of Sign Up using social network icons.

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
I clicked on <social network icon > icon in signup page.
I should see a pop for <social network icon > login is appeared
I loged in with my <signin with social network> credintials
I should see Name field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Country of current resident field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Email Address field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Phone Number field in the sign up from is auto filled

elements.name: Verify functionality of Sign Up using social network icons.

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
I clicked on <social network icon > icon in signup page.
I should see a pop for <social network icon > login is appeared
I loged in with my <signin with social network> credintials
I should see Name field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Country of current resident field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Email Address field in the sign up from is auto filled
I should see Phone Number field in the sign up from is auto filled

elements.name: Verifying the functionality of Sign Up(with valid details)

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
Registered with valid details
I should see Registration is successful

elements.name: verify the 'welcome' pop up after successful sign up

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
I completed sign up
I should see a welcome pop up
I should see 'Thank you for registering with us' text along with User name
I should see 'Your shop N zip ID' text along with ID
I should see 'Your Shop N Zip address' text along with shop N zip US location address
I should see 'Start shopping' button

elements.name: Verify the Sign In verification link exipre time

steps.name: I am in sign up page
I completed sign up
I should get verification link to the specified email address
It should be valid upto one year

elements.name: verify the Sign in verification link functionality

steps.name: I am in sign up page
I completed sign up
I should get verification link to the specified email address
I click on the verifiction link
I should be navigated to shop N zip application
I should see verification is successful

elements.name: verify the Sign in verification link functionality(of verified link)

steps.name: I am in sign up page
I completed sign up
I should get verification link to the specified email address
I click on the verifiction link
I should be navigated to shop N zip application
I should see verification is successful
I logged out
click on same verficatoin link again in email
I should be redirected to shop n zip application
I should see a message saying 'Your email is already been verified'

elements.name: verify the Sign in verification link functionality(of not a verified link after one year)

steps.name: I am in sign up page
I completed sign up
I should get verification link to the specified email address
I click on verficatoin link in email after one year
I should be redirected to shop n zip application
I should see a message saying 'Your link is either incorrect or expired'

elements.name: Verifying the functionality of Sign Up (without Entering any of the fields)

steps.name: I am in Sign Up page
I clicked on 'Register now' button
it should see registration is unsuccessful
